configuration.name: widget_06449933252035898
configuration.stem: Order the following events into a sequence that most logically describes the movement of water from the ocean to the bottom of a well in a village on the island.

feedBack.firstWrongHint: Think about the processes that move water from the ocean into the atmosphere, into clouds, from atmosphere to land, and from land’s surface to underground.
feedBack.finalWrongHint: Water from the ocean’s surface evaporates, condenses into tiny water droplets in clouds, falls to land as precipitation, and moves downward through the soil into the well.
